inputs.name: listingAddress
inputs.description: The listingAddress whose status is being updated

abiDocs.name: updateStatus
abiDocs.notice: Updates a listing's status from 'application' to 'listing' or resolves a challenge if one exists.

inputs.name: listingAddress
inputs.description: A listingAddress with an unresolved challenge

abiDocs.name: challengeCanBeResolved
abiDocs.return: True if a challenge can be resolved, false otherwise
abiDocs.notice: Determines whether voting has concluded in a challenge for a given listingAddress.   Reverts if no challenge exists.

inputs.name: amount
inputs.description: The number of ERC20 tokens to increase a user's unstaked deposit by

abiDocs.name: deposit
abiDocs.notice: Allows the owner of a listingHash to increase their unstaked deposit. In order to increase deposit: sender of message must be owner of listing Must be able to transfer `amount` of tokens into this contract Emits `Deposit` if successful

inputs.name: amount
inputs.description: The number of ERC20 tokens a user is willing to potentially stake

inputs.name: data
inputs.description: Extra data relevant to the application. Think IPFS hashes.

abiDocs.name: apply
abiDocs.notice: Allows a user to start an application. Takes tokens from user and sets apply stage end time. In order to apply: Listing must not currently be whitelisted Listing must not currently be in application pahse Tokens deposited must be greater than or equal to the minDeposit value from the parameterizer Emits `Application` event if successful

inputs.name: listingAddress
inputs.description: The listingAddress whose status is to be examined

abiDocs.name: appWasMade
abiDocs.return: True if an address is in the application phase, or whitelisted. False if never applied or listing/application removed.
abiDocs.notice: Returns true if apply was called for this listingAddress and listing/application not yet removed

inputs.name: listingAddress
inputs.description: The listingAddress whose status is to be examined

abiDocs.name: challengeExists
abiDocs.return: True if listing has an active, unresolved challenge. False otherwise.
abiDocs.notice: Gets whether or not the given listing address has an active challenge

abiDocs.name: exitListing
abiDocs.notice: Allows the owner of a listing to remove the listingHash from the whitelist Returns all tokens to the owner of the listing In order to exit a listing: Sender of message must be the owner of the listing Listing must currently be whitelisted Listing must not have an active challenge

inputs.name: challengeID
inputs.description: The PLCR pollID of the challenge a reward is being claimed for

inputs.name: salt
inputs.description: The salt of a voter's commit hash in the given poll

abiDocs.name: claimReward
abiDocs.notice: Called by a voter to claim their reward for each completed vote.  In order to claim reward for a challenge: Challenge must be resolved Message sender must not have already claimed tokens for this challenge Emits `RewardClaimed` if successful

inputs.name: voter
inputs.description: The address of the voter whose reward balance is to be returned

inputs.name: challengeID
inputs.description: The pollID of the challenge a reward balance is being queried for

inputs.name: salt
inputs.description: The salt of the voter's commit hash in the given poll

abiDocs.name: voterReward
abiDocs.return: The uint indicating the voter's reward
abiDocs.notice: Calculates the provided voter's token reward for the given poll.

inputs.name: listingAddress
inputs.description: The listingAddress being challenged, whether listed or in application

inputs.name: data
inputs.description: Extra data relevant to the challenge. Think IPFS hashes.

abiDocs.name: challenge
abiDocs.notice: Starts a poll for a listingAddress which is either in the apply stage or already in the whitelist. Tokens are taken from the challenger and the applicant's deposits are locked. Delists listing and returns NO_CHALLENGE if listing's unstakedDeposit is less than current minDeposit In order to challenge a listing: Listing must be in application phase or whitelisted Listing must not have an active challenge Sender of message must be able to transfer minDeposit tokens into this contract Emits `ChallengeInitiated` if successful

inputs.name: voter
inputs.description: The voter whose claim status to query for given challenge

abiDocs.name: hasClaimedTokens
abiDocs.return: true if voter has claimed tokens for given challenge, false otherwise

inputs.name: challengeID
inputs.description: The ID of a challenge to determine a reward for

abiDocs.name: determineReward
abiDocs.return: Number of tokens awarded to winning party in a challenge
abiDocs.notice: Determines the number of tokens awarded to the winning party in a challenge.

inputs.name: listingAddress
inputs.description: The listingAddress whose status is to be examined

abiDocs.name: canBeWhitelisted
abiDocs.return: True if an application has passed its expiry without being challenged or it was challenged and the challenge has been resolved and listing is not already whitelisted. False otherwise.
abiDocs.notice: Determines whether the given listing can be whitelisted

inputs.name: amount
inputs.description: The number of ERC20 tokens to withdraw from the unstaked deposit.

abiDocs.name: withdraw
abiDocs.notice: Allows the owner of a listingHash to decrease their unstaked deposit. In order to withdraw from deposit: sender of message must be owner of listing Amount to withdraw must be less than or equal to unstaked deposit on listing Amount of tokens that would be remaining after withdrawal must be less than or equal to minDeposit from parameterizer. Emits `Withdrawal` if successful
